name: High Jump
requires: {OptOne(|Triple Jump|)} or {OptOne(|Back Flip|)} or {OptOne(|Side Flip|)} or ({OptAll(|Ground Pound| and |Ground Pound Jump|)})

name: Pyramid Skip
requires: ({OptOne(|Bullet Bill|)} or (|Cap Vault| and ({OptOne(|Long Jump|)} or {OptOne(|Triple Jump|)})))

name: Into the Lake
requires: (({OptAll(|Zipper| and |Swim|)}) or (|Cap Vault| and (|High Jump| or ({OptOne(|Long Jump|)} or ({OptOne(Triple Jump)} and {OptOne(|Wall Jump|)})))) or ({OptAll(|Cap Jump| and |Triple Jump| and |Wall Jump| and |Goomba|)}))

name: To the Wall
requires: {OptOne(|Hold/Throw|)} or (|High Jump| and |Cap Vault|) or ({OptAll(|Uproot| and |Dive|)})

name: Sherm Wall
requires: |To the Wall| and ({OptOne(|Sherm|)} or ({OptAll(|Goomba| and |Wall Jump| and |Dive|)}))

name: Get to Cheese
requires: {OptOne(|Lava Bubble|)} or ({OptOne(|Dive|)} and ({OptOne(|Triple Jump|)} or {OptOne(|Cap Jump|)} or ({OptAll(|Ground Pound| and |Ground Pound Jump|)})))

name: Get to Meat
requires: {OptOne(|Volbonan|)} or ({OptOne(|Wall Jump|)} and {OptOne(|Dive|)} and (|High Jump| or {OptOne(|Spin|)})) or (|High Jump| and ({OptOne(|Cap Jump|)} or |Cap Vault|))

name: Enter the Courtyard
requires: {OptOne(|Pokio|)} or ({OptOne(|Dive|)} and ({OptOne(|Back Flip|)} or {OptOne(|Wall Jump|)} or ({OptAll(|Ground Pound| and |Ground Pound Jump|)})))

name: Parabones Skip
requires: {OptOne(|Parabones|)} or (|Cap Vault| and ({OptAll(|Long Jump| or |Triple Jump|)}))

name: Moon Cave Skip
requires: {YamlEnabled(moon_cave_skip)} and {OptOne(|Cap Jump|)} and {OptOne(|Wall Jump|)} and ({OptOne(|Back Flip|)} or ({OptAll(|Ground Pound| and |Ground Pound Jump|)}))

name: Tourist 1
copy_location: A Tourist in the Metro Kingdom!

name: Tourist 2
copy_location: A Tourist in the Cascade Kingdom!

name: Tourist 3
copy_location: A Tourist in the Luncheon Kingdom!

name: Tourist 4
copy_location: A Tourist in the Moon Kingdom!

name: Tourist 5
copy_location: A Tourist in the Mushroom Kingdom!

name: Peach Moon
requires: |Peach Cap| and |Peach Cascade| and |Peach Sand| and |Peach Lake| and |Peach Wooded| and |Peach Cloud| and |Peach Lost| and |Peach Metro| and |Peach Snow| and |Peach Seaside| and |Peach Luncheon| and |Peach Ruined| and |Peach Bowser|
